column4: so im going to just throw this out there, but is there a way to use a proxy in terminal?
other than applying Network Proxy settings or using that one export http_proxy command?
then mtr doesn't care about http_proxy
are you sure? its an official program
it's completely up to the program itself how it handles the http_proxy environment variable being set
ok thanks for helping me out ^^
actually just about everyone inserts it often :P
i have to enter it about 8 times on startup
ya it just started happening, it asks for the keyring password about 6 times
